response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. To make this opportunity even more enticing, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $11,000? This offer is valid for a limited time, so I encourage you to respond promptly. I look forward to your positive consideration.", "product_price": 11000}
